title: Missing Parts/Accessories
complaint_description: Main product arrived but missing accessory: charging cable.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Offer refund for accessory or replacement of entire unit if accessory required for use.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #6439. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
